results.title: Resources in its crust
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Earth”.
The major useful organic and mineral substances found in the earth’s crust. Classifies the resources as the metallic minerals, the non-metallic minerals, and the mineral fuels. How some of them are extracted and processed. Steps necessary to conserve irreplaceable resources.
results.description:

results.title: Resources discovered
results.creator_credit: Walter F. Broome and Beechdale Educational Films
results.brief_description: The services which the public library can provide for industry and commerce. How in particular the smaller concern which cannot afford its own special library can through the public library have access to all the information resources of the nation. The way in which the librarian deals with the specific enquiries of different kinds it shown.

results.title: Resistance: Fall of Man
results.brief_description: In an alternate 1951, Sgt. Nathan Hale is among a unit of US soldiers sent to aid the British military against invading aliens, known as Chimera. When Hale’s unit is completely wiped out in a surprise attack, he struggles for survival.

constellations_other.name: Religion, cinema and censorship
constellations_other.description: Religious narratives and themes have a complicated relationship with censorship, with creators pushing the boundaries for better or worse.

results.description: In an alternate 1951, Sgt. Nathan Hale is among a unit of US soldiers sent to aid the British military against invading aliens, known as Chimera. When Hale’s unit is completely wiped out in a surprise attack, he struggles for survival.

results.title: Resistance and the 'High School Walkouts Against Racism'
results.creator_credit: Markus Strazds, Misha Lamb and Davina Rimmer
results.brief_description: The aims of resistance are to bring about a socially equal, democratic and ecologically sustainable socialist world and to organise, educate and mobilise young people to this end. Resistance, a Melbourne based organisation, was involved in organising high school students in protesting against One Nation and the racism this political party espoused and supported. This student movement was called “High School Walkouts Against Racism” and spread nationally with students participating in protest rallies outside the Queensland Parliament against Pauline Hanson and her One Nation Party. This short documentary presents personal views and commentary by two Resistance members, Andy and Liz along with actual footage of some of the protest rallies against racism. Soundtrack: Propagandhi and M.Y.C.

results.title: Resident Evil 4
results.brief_description: An atmospheric survival horror game with inventive third-person shooting mechanics set six years after the events of Resident Evil 2 (1998), Resident Evil 4 follows Leon S. Kennedy, a former Raccoon City police officer sent to Spain on a secret mission.

constellations_other.name: Tracking cinema
constellations_other.description: A constellation looking at the evolution of the tracking / dolly shot.

results.description: An atmospheric survival horror game with inventive third-person shooting mechanics set six years after the events of Resident Evil 2 (1998), Resident Evil 4 follows Leon S. Kennedy, a former Raccoon City police officer sent to Spain on a secret mission to retrieve the president’s daughter from the hands of a mysterious cult. During his mission, he is forced to battle a mind-controlling parasite and its dehumanized hosts.
description_for_label: An atmospheric survival horror game with inventive third-person shooting mechanics set six years after the events of Resident Evil 2 (1998), Resident Evil 4 follows Leon S. Kennedy, a former Raccoon City police officer sent to Spain on a secret mission to retrieve the president’s daughter from the hands of a mysterious cult. During his mission, he is forced to battle a mind-controlling parasite and its dehumanized hosts.

results.title: Resident Evil 2
results.brief_description: In Resident Evil 2, the classic action, tense exploration and puzzle solving gameplay that defined the Resident Evil series returns. Players join rookie police officer Leon Kennedy and college student Claire Redfield, who are thrust together by a zombie outbreak in Raccoon City.

constellations_other.name: Evolution of colour
constellations_other.description: From stenciling film frames through to the survival of Technicolor after Hollywood stopped using it, this Constellation links early cinema to some of the world's greatest films.

results.description: The genre-defining masterpiece Resident Evil 2 returns, completely rebuilt from the ground up for a deeper narrative experience. Using Capcom’s proprietary RE Engine, Resident Evil 2 offers a fresh take on the classic survival horror saga with breathtakingly realistic visuals, heart-poundingly immersive audio, a new over-the-shoulder camera, and modernized controls on top of gameplay modes from the original game. The nightmares return reimagined for the PlayStation®4, Xbox One and Windows PC on January 25, 2019.
description_for_label: The genre-defining masterpiece Resident Evil 2 returns, completely rebuilt from the ground up for a deeper narrative experience. Using Capcom’s proprietary RE Engine, Resident Evil 2 offers a fresh take on the classic survival horror saga with breathtakingly realistic visuals, heart-poundingly immersive audio, a new over-the-shoulder camera, and modernized controls on top of gameplay modes from the original game. The nightmares return reimagined for the PlayStation®4, Xbox One and Windows PC on January 25, 2019.
